title: Plz unlock my accout i'm sorry
body:
riot plz unban my account  i promise wont be toxic anymore i miss this game and my skins 
i was young and didnt know about this ban stuff plz unlock my account i miss this game so much!

replies.body: "I was young" .. Bruh... Your last game was 0/12/0 trynda literally few minutes before you post this.... I guess you grew up a lot in the last 2 hours xD

Riot very very rarely unlocks accounts that were permanently banned fairly. You had several warnings leaving up to this and had your chance. 

You can make a new account if you believe you have truly changed and aren't toxic anymore, but the chances of getting your current account back is pretty much zero.

Also, this isn't Riot. The boards cant help you at all. You have to submit a support ticket to Riot (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) to attempt to get your account back. There is a sticky on this forum explaining this.

This isn't Riot, the boards is for other players to talk and discuss stuff. To contact Riot you would use a support ticket.

But Riot rarely considers appeals for bans that were not applied in error. No harm in trying though.
If you were sorry, you would've never done it.
That is not how that works
Sorry, I talked to CEO of riot and we both agree you'll never be allowed back, Sorry.
Bruh, why'd you waste his time with this person- should have brought up so many other things, like how rude it is to old ADCs to redefine what high-octane damage means. Draven needs adoration.

> [{quoted}](name=DTheLlamaKnight,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=wm3UhRk3,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-12-19T02:44:03.146+0000)
>
> riot plz unban my account  i promise wont be toxic anymore i miss this game and my skins 
> i was young and didnt know about this ban stuff plz unlock my account i miss this game so much!

Chat log please in that Tryndamere game

You had multiple warnings, if you got banned, you are both not sorry and not capable of changing your behavior.

Bans are never reversed unless they are errors or due to account theft.
